### Government of Canada Invitation to Tender

#### Project Title
Application Portfolio Management Solution for the Government of Canada

#### Project ID
WS4127144488

#### Tender Closing Date
July 31, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

#### Brief Description
The Government of Canada is seeking a comprehensive application portfolio management solution to provide a current and historical view of its application portfolio. This solution will enable analysis, reporting, and effective management of IT and business information, supporting strategic decision-making at the federal level.

#### Key Requirements
* Provide Departments and Agencies with an improved way to collect application-related information
* Utilize current and historic data to assess application health and provide recommendations on application modernization
* Identify and link at-risk and mission-critical applications with the services they provide
* Target IT investments for systems of high business value
* Support technical debt remediation

#### Evaluation Criteria
* The selected solution will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
